1.SQO Login
============

import requests
import json

url = "https://sqo.orion.comcast.com/securitymanagement-ms/v1/Login"

payload = json.dumps({
  "user": "ODOUser",
  "password": "Unix11"
})
headers = {
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Cookie': '257df8186b610336b666f50f0ec4f85c=2035bd75361aa25bc53acc8ad8923971'
}

response = requests.request("POST", url, headers=headers, data=payload)

print(response.text)
